title: Waste of time
text: I was stuck on an level a friend told me to buy some lives so I did ! I finally won the level! I’m stuck again ! My friend is also stuck on a level, neither of us are eligible for a free spin! The only help is to buy lives! I have no intentions on buying lives just to win a level! I might occasionally buy lives but it should not be the expectation that it has become! My friend and I have watched the pattern and if you buy lives you will win the level! If this continues I will delete this game! There is no reason to be stuck on a level for days! Without help except pay! No video to watch nor a chance to spin for long periods of time!

title: passes time
text:
nice game to play when bored. 
although, i’ve been playing this game for 8 years. i’ve never won the jackpot on the booster wheel. some levels are repeated. and on the levels where the objective is to get the fruit down OR collect the keys to unlock gels/fruits, the keys or fruits are released when there’s less than 5 moves left!? doesn’t make sense when i need to get 5 fruits in less than 5 turns but i don’t see the first fruit until the last two moves. 
seems like we get ripped off a lot with this game. 
upside- i like the free boosters and extra videos to earn more boosters or chances to earn moves.

title: Review
text: Great game

title: THE BEST GAME EVA!
text:
Hi I am currently on level 2853 and I must say that I LOVE THIS GAME!! Can you add more planets to the Dexter event and I update every week, so plz make this game better to impress me. I also play every day and once I got jackpot on the spin wheel. All you have to do is when the spinner goes on the wrapped and striped booster you win jackpot, or the coconut wheel. (a very common prize) it's cool that you got more than 5k levels!
Also, one question. So, I play Candy Crush Friends also, but why does it glitch me out in jelly and soda? Fix that 2
Please add this to the game!
P.S. I have been noticing super stars does not count on your "Average stars from last 10 levels".

P.P.S I got 1st in Cosmic Climb and I got my prize but how do you customize a character?

title: Love this game but...
text: I love this game and have played for years. One thing that I don’t like about it is that there is the 30 minute wait time for another life. I also play Pet Rescue which only has a 5 minute wait time. Please change this wait time to a shorter window. We who play this game on a daily basis hate having to wait so long for another try at clearing the level and moving on to the next.

title: Was fun. Now it's frustrating.
text: The game is fun at first. When the levels started getting more difficult, an ad feature was built in that made it possible to get extra moves and game boosters to get through difficult levels. Now that's either entirely gone or almost gone and the levels have increased so much in difficulty that it's just frustrating and I don't play much. I will never spend my money on it, they may as well bring back the ads because then they'd make money off my play.

text: Love the game

title: Booster
text: I really enjoy this game, and it’s great for clearing my mind of any other thoughts. Boosters are earned with play or watching videos, or purchase. Basically watching a short video is no different than spending money. Once a booster is earned we can select when to us them which is great. 2 things are not great. 30 second videos are are ridiculous. If you insist on playing them, reward with more boosters as pay to the player. Second, when I choose to us a booster, if I don’t like it’s placement on the candy screen presented for the current level, I should be able to quit that game before any moves are made and not loose the booster. I’ve paid for the booster, I should be able to play it where I want it to be. And not basically loose it if it’s placed in some crazy outlying single box where it can never be used.

title: Game is Ruined
text: I just downloaded the game again. (Level 5000) last time. I am on level 66 and have not seen a sugar drop yet. Are they gone?  Also, I noticed that you can not reset a game. Is this how Candy Crush is set up now?  If so, that’s a bad change in my view.

title: Glitch in 1212
text: There is something wrong with level 1212. Some levels are more challenging than others and thats fine, but this one is basically impossible. Not enough moves to solve. I guess I’m going to have to quit the game as much as I’ve enjoyed it all these years. I’ll keep updating tho, just in case it’s fixed.

title: Great game, obvious bating
text: I’d given this game 5 stars. Played it off and on for years. I always remember why I delete it after a few days. I can’t stand the bate you dangle when I have one obstacle left, but “oh no” I’ve run out of turns. Wait! Just purchase more! Nah... I’ll probably always play it until I get fed up with your BS on trying to get me to purchase boosters. What was once something to just mindlessly relax with, has now become aggravating.

title: Gimme money app
text: These gimme gimme gimme $$$ app "games" are THE WORST. Someone in the office was playing this and I thought I'd revisit it. I had played it years ago but trashed it from my phone when it became clear that you could not pass at a certain level without giving money. Was playing it recently due to peer pressure at work, until I got to the rainbow level. If the balls are always changing colors you have no way to really strategize. So basically you're gambling in a really boring way. I refuse to give these turdz my hard earned money to play a game. Just charge one straight fee upfront and let that be that. The worst part about this is that it is clearly marketed primarily to children and young people, and those who are gullible or...well... You finish that thought. Having revisited this now much older, I have ZERO respect for the game developers or the knuckleheads that give them their hard earned dough. NOPE!
